values:
Time to let You run the show.
I've done a horrible job and 
now know You can do better.
I've gotta stop with my excuses
I make and start acting on 
things I can do. 
Allow me to enjoy the gift 
of life You've given to me and be
grateful for what You've given me, 
instead of being ungrateful for
what I dont have that I want.

-Me in a conversation with a good friend.



writings...

struggling to find my feet
i have no other place to go
my mind is filled all day
with simple pains and fears

i can only look to You
and pray to persevere.
because it is not mine,
but Yours that will be done.

stumbling on my path
its hard to walk toward You
my desires are far off
and i have only You

it shoudl be easier,
 should be my desire
but i am selfish 
and become reluctant.
i feel myself tire 
      from this journey.

i drop to my knees
 i have nothing left
i look to You for hope
and I remember what you said.

"I am the way, truth and life."
only my heart is calmed.
my mind races to its own end.
and the walk begins again.

why do they control
this much of my thought
i want to stop this shit
its as though i never fought

can't understand why 
but they get space in my head
i want to stop this shit
i want You instead.

they dont even help now
but You are there for all time
i want to stop this shit
but instead i jsut write this rhyme

ignorance is bliss
or at least thats what they say
i want to stop this shit
i cannot wait for that day.

i have no other place to go

People come into your life for a Reason, a Season or a Lifetime. When you know which one it is, you will know what to do for that person. When someone is in your life for a REASON, it is usually to meet a need you have expressed. They have come to assist you through a difficulty, to provide you with guidance and support, to aid you physically, emotionally, or spiritually. They may seem like a godsend, and they are! They are there for the reason you need them to be.

Then, without any wrongdoing on your part, or at an inconvenient time, this person will say or do something to bring the relationship to an end. Sometimes they die. Sometimes they walk away. Sometimes they act up and force you to take a stand. What we must realize is that our need has been met, our desire fulfilled, their work is done. The prayer you sent up has been answered, and now it is time to move on.

Some people come into your life for a SEASON, because your turn has come
to share, grow, or learn. They bring you an experience of peace, or make you laugh. They may teach you something you have never done. They usually give you an unbelievable amount of joy. Believe it! It is real! But, only for a season.

LIFETIME relationships teach you lifetime lessons: things you must build upon in order to have a solid emotional foundation. Your job is to accept the lesson, love the person, and put what you have learned to use in all other relationships and areas of your life. It is said that love is blind but friendship is clairvoyant.


i'd like to look at all the people in my life and try to figure out the lifetime ones
:/

i stand and face the winds
remebering my sins
i try to stand
but with no strength
i fall to the floor
i look up and see the storm
which is headed toward me
and as i close my eyes
and brace for the worst
i hear a voice say
"this is only the beginning"

i scream with conviction.
its the thrill of the fight,
         so lets see what you got.

just keep it coming.

catholicTorch.com - are you ready to be a fire starter?

If you would like to help a friend and me out. 
You could do this survey for us. It's for a site we are creating.
The site will be focused on Catholicism for Youth. 
We want your feedback!


Answer any, all of these questions below. Thanks for your time.
Questions created by Rick Craine in order to create a website that will actually make sense.
Please return answers to CatholicJesusFreaks@hotmail.com.
Thank You

Website Questionnaire:

AGE:  12-16, 16-20, 21-26, 26-34, 34+
SEX - m / f

1. What is your favorite website? (visually, list more than one if necessary)

2. What is your favorite website? (visited most often, list more than one if necessary)

3. What are some of your hobbies?

4. What do you think is lacking the most on the web in reference to Catholicism?
	(if this question does not mean anything to you feel free to skip)

5. What are the colors on your desktop set to?
	(i.e. XP Blue and Green, Classic - Green and Blue, etc.)

6. What are your favorite colors?

7. Do you have any experience with HTML, CSS, Perl, XML or any other web language.

8. What is the most important part of a website that you are visiting?
	(i.e. Message boards, interactivity, solid information, catchy design, downloads, etc.)

9. Is Catholic Jesus Freaks a suitable name? If not please suggeset replacements!	

10. Any other suggestions for a website that will be devoted to the evangelization of the web? 



THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME AND ENERGY AND PLEASE KEEP THE CJF TEAM IN YOUR PRAYERS!
God Bless

The CJF Team
(Eric and Rick)

Esto Vir

PLEASE EMAIL THE ANSWERS TO CATHOLICJESUSFREAKS@HOTMAIL.COM

Thanks.

refrain:
i've lost all faith
   in the words you say,
  broken my trust,
 i'm slapped in the face.

all you've ever said
    loses all its value
 now i'm the one who's
   standing alone, without you.
lost, confused at how you
    could do all this
feeling nothing but regret and pain
  wondering if its me, you miss.

i've got nothing inside 
   and nothing to hold onto
wanting to disappear
  and just forget you
 i'm so hurt and broken
completely lost inside
no one is gettin in
   behind myself i'll hide

rejection, anger, fear
  seep into the soul,
you've left me wounded,
  with a gaping hole,
i've been spiteful but now
      i know its not my loss
 now that its finally over
all i'm left with is my cross

so i say goodbye(i'm done)
  last time i step to the plate
the damage is done, scars will form
    nothing can be fixed,
 because it's too late.

I finished Love and Responsibility Simplified Version today! 
3 down. i meant books hahaha.

i started to read Love and Responsibility a simplified version by Monsignor Walsh from Philly, and i'm about half way thruogh and love it, and wish i'd read it earlier in my life. I'm reading the simplified version first so maybe i can catch some of the stuff in the full version. remember i'm not a very smart guy.
here is perhaps my favorite part...and where the book gets its name from..i'm guessing...

These are the words in teh book that I am reading and do not know if they are the words in the original work.
"Love demands a responsibility for this other person who has been drawn into the closest possible relationship, becoming even the property of the subject. Each person has a responsibility for their own love, being sure that their love is mature enough to justify the trust of the other person."

"Only when tested, can love be shown as true."

"To desire the unlimited good for the other is really to desire God for them."

i'll be putting some of my own thoughts and reflections and writings up later about this and other stuff.

FOUND THIS ON TOM'S JOURNAL...It's alright, thought I'd put it on with the Love and Responsibility thing...yea..
What is love? 
When we claim that it's love that we have for someone, are we correct? 

Something to ponder upon..... 

Are your palms sweaty, is your heart racing and is your voice caught within your chest? 
It isn't love, it's LIKE. 

You can't keep your eyes or hands off of them, am I right?
It isn't love, it's LUST.

Are you proud, and eager to show them off? 
It isn't love, it's LUCK. 

Do you want them because you know they're there? 
It isn't love, it's LONELINESS. 

Are you there because it's what everyone wants? 
It isn't love, it's LOYALTY. 

Are you there because they kissed you, or held your hand? 
It isn't love, it's LOW CONFIDENCE. 

Do you stay for their confessions of love, because you don't want to hurt them? 
It isn't love, it's PITY. 

Do you belong to them because their sight makes your heart skip a beat? 
It isn't love, it's INFATUATION. 

Do you pardon their faults because you care about them? 
It isn't love, it's FRIENDSHIP. 

Do you tell them every day they are the only one you think of? 
It isn't love, it's a LIE. 

Are you willing to give all of your favorite things away for their sake? 
It isn't love,it's CHARITY. 

Does your heart ache and break when they're sad? 
Then it's LOVE. 

Do you cry for their pain, even when they're strong? 
Then it's LOVE. 

Do their eyes see your true heart, and touch your soul so deeply it hurts? 
Then it's LOVE. 

Do you stay because a blinding, incomprehensible mix of pain and relation pulls you close and holds you there? 
Then it's LOVE. 

Do you accept their faults because they're a part of who they are? 
Then it's LOVE. 

Are you attracted to others, but stay with them faithfully without regret? 
Then it's LOVE. 

Would you allow them to leave you not because they want to but because they have to? 
Then its LOVE.



Would you give them your heart, your life, your death? 
Then it's LOVE. 


Now, if love is painful, and tortures us so, why do we love? 
Why is it all we search for in life? 
This pain, this agony? 
Why is it all we long for? 
This torture, this powerful death of self? 
Why? 
The answer is so simple cause it's...LOVE. 
It is such an addictive thing that even people who are not having it wish to experience and share it with

"my immortal
i'm so tired of being here
suppressed by all of my childish fears
and if you have to leave
i wish that you would just leave
because your presence still lingers here
and it won't leave me alone 

these wounds won't seem to heal
this pain is just too real
there's just too much that time cannot erase

when you cried i'd wipe away all of your tears
when you'd scream i'd fight away all of your fears
and i've held your hand through all of these years
but you still have all of me

you used to captivate me
by your resonating light
but now i'm bound by the life you left behind
your face it haunts my once pleasant dreams
your voice it chased away all the sanity in me"
Evanescence - My Immortal

It's only been 3 days and the only good times I have had were with friends from CUA who live on Long Island. I know you guys have it in you....meanig my friends from Long Island, they all fell off the face of the earth. Things just keep getting more confusing. (BACK UP) Well confusing and better I guess. The wedding is in 10 days. I can't wait because I get to go pick up my friend Erin from Jersey and visit a good friend ;p. haha. Then the wedding is going to rock house. Then I am on vacation in Jersey! CRAZY! Well anything is better than Long Island right now. It's so depressing how everyone has grown apart except for like 3 people. It's just boring and blah! I am doing good though. I can't complain. My dad is starting with crap because he's getting stressed with the wedding so say some prayers thanks. I hope you all have a blessed night. here's an idea....read...Matthew 6:25-34...and you can understand the reason for my worry-free life. DUH! God is good all the time.
i think that sums it all up. God is a comedian.

<font face=stylus bt>I mean this is a great week and all and I'm not depressed. Rather the week is depressing. I am leaving in 3 days which I love so much but the people are not the same. No offense to those at home because these people aren't like you either. I'm going to miss a few of those seniors who aren't coming back. Finals were alright...I mean I bet studying would help. I will find out how I did in a few weeks. Dad's wedding is coming up, bringing my friend from Jersey. She's pretty cool ;-) I haven't been hanging out with a few of the people I wish I could spend more time with, but it's the roll of the dice (and no not those dice karen or robin) Well summer here I come...well not really...after the Physics final @ 8am tomorrow MY LIFE IS FREE <font size=2>well at least for 3 months and school...but not work</font>

Well the last week has started and everyone is getting edgy because it's the end of the year. I just don't understand some people sometimes. 3 months away...i keep saying it will be good and bad. I hope more good than bad. I need to get a job for 3 nights during the week like tuesday-thursday night from 7-11 or 6-12 or something like that so i can make some cash on the side. Last night was hysterical when JP got hit on by our guy waiter. HAHA. That was great. It's nice having a car here, because i get to eat A LOT of fast food. But i have a dilemna do i leave early or wait for nader? well ttyl have a great day.
I AM GOING TO SLEEP! WOO HOO FINALLY.....i cant sleep...long night...wendy's yet again....no weight tho...hope you get your computer rye. 6 days i am gone! woo hoo. pray thanks...

<font face="Stylus BT">Wow...I'm trying to use this thing for Live Journal and it doesn't seem to be cool or anything. I wonder if it will work. Well I only have 7 days left here at CUA til August 16th. Wow...3 months away from here. It is good and bad. I am going to work the whole summer hopefully make some nice money. Freshman retreat is going to rock. Alright thats it for now. Also if you all could pray for my friend Tiana who is having her baby daughter in the next 24 hours. God bless all PX</font>
-Riggs

I am finished with most of my work, except all the studying for finals. The summer is going to be fun...alot of fun stuff. NOT. anyways nothing much is going on...I have the Wagon here....it's fun. Bye to all. Talk to you soon

He definately shown me understanding, and patience. He is just so endless it's CRAZY! LIFE IS GOOD. happy ryan that i am writing you little s.o.b. LOL who leaves messages here?

Happy Easter everyone. I hope you all have a holy and happy Easter. I spent the day working on the deck with my dad and dee. I also helped him clean out the garage and it's actually clean in there now. I had a good trip home. I can't complain about it...I mean I can now say Alleluia again...LOL...dork...Went to mass each day. Hopefully I'll go tomorrow. Then I'm going back to CUA around 9 but I won't be on campus til probably 1030 or so...so that should be fun. I have to work on English work...I'll do that tomorrow on the plane, bus, and train. Well...thats basically it. 
<font size=1 face="Comic Sans">"What we think we want may not always be what we want. "</font>

I'm having a great day....it was basically some work and confession. Confession was good. A lot of stuff was talked about and it was just an enjoyable way of experiencing Christ's love for us...especially me. I had a great weekend. I hung out with Freshman retreat on Friday night. Saturday Night I hung out with Erin, Erin, KSue, Ed, Robin, and Seth. We went to Kosi's and then hung out at the House for a bit. Then Sunday night hung out with Seth, Erin, and KSue. Last Night We did Stations of the Cross...it was nice but could have used some projecting readers... :-/ , anyway I then hung out with Melissa and we watched Aladdin...that movie is timeless. I had a great time. Today was confession and then on to house mass later and I will write more then. Until Then YES! LORD! AMEN! GOOD GOOD STUFF.....JESUS CHRISTO IS GREAT!

ALL THE TIME, GOD IS GOOD. FRESHMAN RETREAT I LOVE YOU GUYS. anyways it was an awesome night nad the Holy Spirit was moving in that room like whoa! JUST SO YOU KNOW, i have a good feeling about those things, why? CUZ GOD IS GOOD. I can't explain how much I needed last night. God knew it....and He delivered. AMEN. I GOT A HUG! I GOT A HUG! Hope your weekends are good. I'm hanging out with a cool Jersey girl, (I know it is an oxy-moron) this weekend and I hope to have fun and just enjoy it. This is one of my last weekends here since I am going home for the next 2.

"Point my feet in the way they should go
Place Your Holy Spirit in me
Lead me in the way everlasting
I long to have a heart that's pure
Before You, before You."
Vineyard Music.
    - God knows what is in our hearts.

This week is a total opposite of last week. Last week was fun, nice weather, just everything seemed to be going up. This week....rainy, not so fun, and just really really blah! Alexis isn't coming to CUA next year :/ which stinks. I thought she would like to try our retreat that we are working on for the Freshman Retreat. I ask that you all ask God that we are able to live with His will and gain knowledge through our experience in life. 
Blah!

Tuesday was a sad, sad day. Many reasons, life is great and all but I am trying to learn to deal with God's plan and not what I want. I started this so I can get some feedback from people. LOL. Anyways...praying is fun, God is good, All the time. God bless all. Pray for clarity of mind and heart.
